Title: A FREE and SIMPLE ASP.NET weather control you can customize (C#)
Description:
This is a weather control originally written by Leon Amarant in VB. I converted it to C# for my own use. I am providing it here for others to use but I do not support it in any way. 

His original VB version can be found here:
http://www.codeplex.com/aspnetweather
HomeWiki:
Project Description

*** This project no longer works. Weather.com has discontinued their free weather feed. Feel free to learn how it works and convert it to use a different feed. ***

This is a weather control originally written by Leon Amarant in VB. I converted it to C# for my own use. I am providing it here for others to use but I do not support it in any way.

His original VB version can be found here:
http://www.codeplex.com/aspnetweather
